Barcelona Tumbang Lagi, Ernesto Valverde Ogah Mengundurkan Diri
03 Nov 2019, 03:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Barcelona, Ernesto Valverde menegaskan tidak mau mengundurkan diri pasca timnya dikalahkan Levante. Valverde menilai ini hanya kekalahan yang biasa sehingga ia tidak perlu sampai mengundurkan diri.
Pada jornada ke 12 La Liga, Barcelona lagi-lagi menelan kekalahan. Bertandang ke markas Levante, sang juara La Liga itu tumbang dengan skor 3-1.
Pada laga itu, Barca sejatinya unggul 1-0 terlebih dahulu melalui gol Lionel Messi. Namun di babak kedua, Levante berhasil mencetak tiga gol dalam kurun waktu tujuh menit saja.
Valverde menegaskan bahwa ia belum mau mengundurkan diri paska kekalahan tersebut. "Tentu saja saya tidak memikirkan untuk mengundurkan diri," ujar Valverde kepada Marca.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.

Barcelona Down Again, Ernesto Valverde Resigns
Nov 3 2019, 03:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona coach Ernesto Valverde has insisted he will not resign after his team was beaten by Levante. Valverde considered this just an ordinary defeat so he did not need to resign.
In the 12th season of La Liga, Barcelona again lost. Come to the headquarters of Levante, the La Liga champions were toppled with a score of 3-1.
In that match, Barca actually winning 1-0 in advance through goals from Lionel Messi. But in the second half, Levante scored three goals in just seven minutes.
Valverde stressed that he did not want to resign after the defeat. "Of course I'm not thinking about resigning," Valverde told Marca.
